sanskrit_verse: अश्लीकमेतत्साधूनां यत्र जुह्वत्यमी हविः । अश्लीलम् प्रतीपमेतद्देवानां तस्मात्तत्परिवर्जयेत् ॥ ४.२०६॥
transliteration: aślīkam etat sādhūnāṁ yatra juhvaty amī haviḥ | aślīlam pratīpam etad devānāṁ tasmāt tat parivarjayet || 4.206 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: This act is unseemly for the virtuous, where these beings offer oblations; it is improper and contrary to the divine order—therefore, such actions must be abandoned.
